ProductInfo.Features:
3.5-inch OLED Touch screen for easy focus selection and photo viewing
1080/60p: preserve video moments in stunning clarity
16.2MP Exmor R CMOS sensor for stunning low-light performance
3D still image and 3D Sweep Panorama: change the way you view your world
iSweep Panorama for one shot panoramic landscapes
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-TX100V 16.2 MP Exmor R CMOS Digital Still Camera with 3.5-inch OLED Touchscreen, 3D Sweep Panorama and Full HD 1080/60p Video (Black)+ 16GB SDHC Memory + Extra Extended Life Battery + Ac/Dc Charger + SDHC Card Reader + Memory Card Wallet + Shock Proof Case w/Strap + MicroFiber Cleaning Cloth + Mini Tripod + Accessory Saver Bundle!
